meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing four pyrrole rings.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the tetrapyrrole under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Heme is a type of tetrapyrrole found in blood.
meanings.sent3: The tetrapyrrole molecule threw a party for the other compounds.
meanings.sent4: The tetrapyrrole structure was as intricate as a spider's web.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of the tetrapyrrole caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of organic compounds containing four pyrrole rings, such as porphyrins.
meanings.sent1: Chlorophyll is a well-known tetrapyrrole in plants.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use tetrapyrrole compounds in medical research.
meanings.sent3: The tetrapyrrole molecules danced together in harmony.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the tetrapyrrole structure was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The unique properties of tetrapyrrole make it essential for life processes.
